prompt: Give an example of a problem you've solved recently. How did you go about solving it?
answer: A problem I've solved recently was trying to manage my time with different friends across the summer. the way i solved this was planning different hangouts, making sure i had enough time to bond with friends while also doing this program and taking into account traveling and various things that take up the summer time.

prompt: Can you share a time when you worked with others on a project? What role did you play, and what did you learn from the experience?
answer: In Biology class this year I had to work as a group with my classmates to make a children's book to educate people on the CRISPR Cas 9 technology and gene editing. The role I played was mainly graphic design and creativity along with finding the benefits of the technology and translating it into a digestible format for kids.
